title: JS1K 2012 Entry
content:
JS1K 2012 Entry

My entry for the JS1K demo competition of 2012: generates more neoplasticist art than you can watch.
Click here for a live version of the demo.
Link to the actual entry in the competition: http://js1k.com/2012-love/demo/1154
summary: My entry for the JS1K demo competition of 2012: generates more neoplasticist art than you can watch.
